text: Munderoo is a rural community in the south east part of the Riverina. It is situated about 11 kilometres west from Mannus, and 16 kilometres north from Ournie. At the 2006 census, Munderoo had a population of 358 people. The area took its name from a farming property Mundaroo which is situated near the Ournie Road and Linden Roth Drive T-intersection. The only public building in the area is the Bush Fire Brigade Shed situated on that same intersection. ==Notes and references== Category:Towns in the Riverina Category:Towns in New South Wales
title: Munderoo, New South Wales
